programme.title: White Apache
programme.desc: Outlaws attack a band of settlers and kill everyone except a pregnant woman who's rescued by a band of Indians. The woman dies giving birth but Chief White Bear adopts her male baby, naming him "Shining Sky," and raising him as brother to his own son, Black Wolf.

programme.title: The Reward's Yours... The Man's Mine
programme.desc: A group of killers seek out wanted gunman El Puro for the $10,000 dollar reward.

programme.title: Dead Men Don't Count
programme.desc: Two gunmen ride into a town with a plan to collect a large unearned bounty but are caught up in the local war for land caused by the impending arrival of the railroad.

programme.title: Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: Bounty hunter Stan Ross arrives in Canyon City, drawn by a bank robbery. Hired by the town’s powerful banker Jefferson, he hunts down a gang of Mexican bandits - only to uncover shocking secrets. As Ross digs deeper, he realizes Jefferson’s grip on the town is far more dangerous than he thought.

programme.title: They Called Him Trinity
programme.desc: An ex-sheriff sets out to find the bandits who beat and murdered his sister.

programme.title: Requiescant
programme.desc: The adopted son of a preacher comes upon a village that is under the thumb of a deranged ex-Confederate officer, who is - among other things - stealing land from the locals with phony land grants.

programme.title: More Dollars for the MacGregors
programme.desc: Forsythe, who uses his wife as bait, has gained a reputation as a gunslinger.

programme.title: A Minute to Pray, a Second to Die
programme.desc: In Tuscola, New Mexico, the Governor offers amnesty papers to all outlaws but gunfighter Clay McCord's appearance triggers a violent confrontation between the local marshal, McCord, and other outlaws.

programme.title: Django Kill... If You Live, Shoot!
programme.desc: Various factions, feud over stolen gold in a surreal town.

programme.title: California
programme.desc: After the Civil War, Michael "California" Random, is released from prison and goes to Missouri with his partner William.

programme.title: The Son of Zorro
programme.desc: In imperial Mexico, Don Ricardo Villaverde leads a double life as the masked Son of Zorro, defending the oppressed from the cruel Governor Leblanche. When rebels ambush a weapons convoy and kill Don Herrera, his daughter Conchita is saved by Zorro, sparking a daring fight against tyranny.

programme.title: A Few Bullets More
programme.desc: Billy starts as an innocent outlaw protecting his mother but soon becomes a ruthless killer. When love gives him hope for change, Pat Garrett, a fatherly friend, helps him try to turn his life around. Yet fate drags Billy back into violence, and Garrett is ultimately credited with his death.

programme.title: Dynamite Jim
programme.desc: Union soldiers secure a shipment of gold from a sly Mexican banker, but their journey is anything but safe. Crooked outlaws, the treacherous banker himself, and the notorious Dynamite Jim all set their sights on the treasure. Betrayals and ambushes await as the race for the gold heats up.

programme.title: Djurado
programme.desc: Djurado is a gun-slinging professional gambler who struts into the small town of Silver Mine and wins half of the local saloon, the other part of which belongs to Barbara, whilst battling notorious outlaw Tucan.

programme.title: Sabata the Killer
programme.desc: Sabata and Mangosta are bank robbers, who after a bank job, through a series of events, end up teaming up with the bank clerk, Peter. They then go on the run with Peter's boss and a hired posse equipped with the latest technology in weapons on their trail.
